translations.translation: You are only the warner of those who fear it.
Your duty is only to warn him who fears it.
You are only a warner to him who has a fear of it.
You are only a warner for those who fear such a day.
You are but a Herald of Warning, for one who fears it.
You are only a warner for those who fear it,
You are only a warner to him who would fear it.
Thou art only the warner of him who fears it.
Thou art but a warner unto him who feareth it.
you are but a warner for those who fear it.
Thou art but a warner Unto him who feareth.
You are only a warner for those who are afraid it.
Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.
You (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) are only a warner for those who fear it,
You are but a warner for those who fear it.
You are just a warner for whoever dreads it.
You are only a warner for those who fear it.
[79:45] You are only a warner for, your warning will only benefit, the one who fears it.
(Thou art but a warner) you are but a warning messenger by means of the Qur'an (unto him who feareth it) to him who fears its advent.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَٰهَا } [النازعات: 45] أي: أنت ما تُبعث إلاَّ
 لإنذار الخائفين الموفقين على الخوف من أهوالها وأفزاعها
 لا من المقدِّرين المعيِّنين لوقتها


كيف يسع لك هذا التعيين التقدير
 إذ هي من جملة الغيوب التي استأثر الله بها
 ولم يطلع أحداً عليها؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ إِنما أنت منذرُ من يخشاها } أي: لم تُبعث لتُعلمهم وقت الساعة
 وإنما بُعثت لتُخوّف مِن أهوالها مَن يخاف شدائدها
